description: A payload test-automation controller for MISP created by Digisafe (STEE-Infosec)

predicates.expanded: This tag triggers a test to start. Can be applied to payload or test-case event
This tag for test is in progress
This tag for test reaches completion
This tag for target test machine
This tag is to retrieve all APT related payloads
Type 3, exploits-based eg. pdf, msoffice, images, videos, audio, fonts, active-contents
